select user_id,user_code,user_name,nation,user_phone,user_telephone,user_email,company,company_address,company_web, post,user_state,user_type,operator_id,DATE_FORMAT(follow_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as followTime,subtotal,remark, region from CRM_USER where user_state = '1'
and user_type = '0'
and user_type = '1'
and (operator_id = #{operatorId} or operator_id in (select cs.staff_id from CRM_STAFF cs where cs.operator_id = #{operatorId}) )
and ( user_name like CONCAT (concat('%',#{searchValue}),'%') or user_phone like CONCAT (concat('%',#{searchValue}),'%') or company like CONCAT (concat('%',#{searchValue}),'%') or region like CONCAT (concat('%',#{searchValue}),'%') )
order by update_time desc

select user_id,user_name,user_phone,company,user_email,operator_id,USER_TYPE,USER_STATE,CREATE_TIME,UPDATE_TIME,remark from CRM_USER where user_state = 1 and (user_name like CONCAT (concat('%',#{s}),'%') or user_phone like CONCAT (concat('%',#{s}),'%') or company like CONCAT (concat('%',#{s}),'%') or user_email like CONCAT (concat('%',#{s}),'%') or remark like CONCAT (concat('%',#{s}),'%')) order by update_time desc
